report.title: Squares Per Habitat
report.description: Return a square if it has a plot that is associated with an sample for the broad/fine habitats provided in the parameter. Note that a broad or fine scale habitat can be explicitly saved for a sample, however if a fine scale habitat is explicitly saved, then when a broad scale habitat is reported on, we need to work out the related broad scale habitat from the termlists_terms.parent_id
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites square_w on square_w.location_id=square.id AND square_w.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id=square.id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN samples samp on samp.location_id = plot.id AND samp.survey_id in (#limit_survey_ids#) AND samp.deleted = false AND samp.training = false JOIN sample_attribute_values sampHabVal on sampHabVal.sample_attribute_id=#habitat_attr_id# AND sampHabVal.sample_id=samp.id AND sampHabVal.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms habTt on habTt.id = sampHabVal.int_value AND habTt.term!='Not in scheme' LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms habTtParent on habTtParent.id = habTt.parent_id WHERE square.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id# AND square.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (habTtParent.id IS NULL OR habTtParent.term!='Not in scheme')

param.name: broad_habitat
param.description: Broad scale habitat to report on.

param.name: fine_habitat
param.description: Fine scale habitat to report on.

param.name: habitat_attr_id
param.description: Id of the sample attribute that holds the habitat.

param.name: ignore_sample_dates_before
param.description: Ignore samples whose date is before this date (we can ignore previous years data).

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: limit_survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.
